name: New Testament
description:
• Enjoy this short prologue of the New Testament, a story-driven horror game inspired by the classic PS1 games. 
  • Discover why that church is the only one to accept volunteers to work.

Duration: 10-15 minutes

Story

You and your father went through a terrible crisis when your mother died. Now you are in serious danger of going to live on the streets.

Fortunately, a small church located in a rural area accepts the volunteer work of children from low-income families for a simple job: sweep the floor.

It is up to you to help your father at this very difficult time.

Warning: This game may not be suitable for some people. Play at your own risk.
